1.content:
Amy was getting ready for yet another day of typical teen life. Her parents were away and let her take care of her little sister. It was a tall responsibility, but the young spunky average sized short teen with black hair knew what she was doing. “Melody, get up! It’s gonna be a long day you know?”

“Coming..!” Melody said, still in her pajamas as she walked down the stairs, and looked up at her sister. “But it’s too early.. why are we even up yet..?”

While the innocent conversation was going on however, hidden in their home, was a tiny alien drone. Lightyears away, aliens planned the destruction of the planet, and for fun, decided to make two cute girls the ones who eventually crush the whole planet, hidden from view, while the two sisters talked, they shot a growth ray beam at them, so silent and unnoticeable, and then vanished..

“Well..” Amy said, looking down at her sister. “Don’t you remember? Today is...”
1.title: The Beginning of a Long Day

choices: We proceed from Melody’s point of view
We proceed from Amy’s point of view
11.content:
“School. I know, not the most exciting thing in the world, but its there.” Amy said, muttering it a little bit just as she knows all the bull crap that schools tends to give out. Plenty of homework, bratty teenagers and kids, annoying jocks, and so much more. Melody doesn’t think of it too much as she does get to hang out with her friends and learn, and was a little excited for today as she and her friends are working on a science lab project about disceting a frog.

“Well for me, it isn’t that bad. Me and my friends are going to be working on some frog disceting for science today, plus of course all the boring stuff that you mention as well, but at least I take it seriously.” Melody said just as she starts going with her sister to their rooms and started getting dressed for the day.

“Well, that is one thing that somehow I cannot do. Man, don’t you feel sometimes that school makes you wanna crush something.” Amy wondered just as she got dressed for the day and got their stuff, like lunches and what not.

“Well, bullies and what not.” Melody replied.

“That for sure, but I mean... the stress of homework and not having a lot of time to hangout with one another.” Amy then told her sister, trying to cheer her up a little bit.

“Well, we gotta do what we gotta do.” Melody said, sounding mature for her age. As soon as they got their backpack and everything, Amy and Melody walked to elementary school together. Amy always goes with her sister to make sure she gets there safe, after she drops her off there, she then proceeds to her high school for the day.

Where to do you wanna proceed the story?
11.title: School. Hooray.

choices: Both of them suddenly starts growing
They continue with their day, heading for the beach
12.content:
“Beach day.” Amy said, smiling at her sister, who then started to jump with joy a little bit. “You and I really wanted to go to this beach for awhile and get some sun and play in the water, but there is more to that.” Suddenly as both of them started going into their rooms and getting their swimsuits for the day, they then both meet back up with one another, with Melody smiling.

“And what is that?” Melody asked curiously, just as she goes in and tries a few bikinis in her room with her sister Amy.

“There is going to be a bikini contest call “Big and Little Siszillas! Its where they are having us for a bikini suit at the ocean, towering over a model city like Godzilla, and we smash it up using our bodies. The winners would get to be featured in an all new monster movie. Perhaps you and I could become famous that way.” Amy said, wanted to get noticed at school and what not. She was currently now testing out a orange bikini that fits her frame, and Melody was wearing a pink one with a kitty character on it.

“Yeah, because I do like monster movies, scary ones for sure, but big monster movies the most.” Melody smiled just as she and Amy have kinda of a giantess fetish, wanting to tower over stuff with their sexy bodies and what not, well soon that is going to start literally happening for sure.

What happens now?
12.title: Beach Day! Bikini time!

choices: They appear dazed and confused at the situation
They suddenly turn evil, and start playing around the city, and rampaging
123.content:
Just as both of them were admiring one another in their respective bikinis, suddenly Melody was starting to feel a little strange inside her body as if something was bothering her. Suddenly she grew a few minor inches, which seems to startle Amy a little bit. “Uh.... Melody, are you feeling okay?” Amy then asked just as she sees right before her very eyes her sister growing a few inches.

“Yeah, because I am now at your height?... Oh wait!” She said just as he noticed Amy starting growing a few inches as well. “It seems you are growing as well, I am big as you compared to a few moments ago where I was smaller.” She said. Suddenly both of the girls feels their bikini getting tighter on them (don’t worry, it won’t burst off) and adjusting to more of their frame as if something was happening to them. Suddenly both Melody and Amy grew a few feet, starting to head for the ceilings. “Oh boy, this is getting so out of hand now. We need to call mom!” Amy said just as she tries to get her phone, but suddenly both of the girls then have another big spurt, and suddenly they were growing even more bigger suddenly, now starting to barely fit their room, and as they grew bigger, they suddenly get heavier, and the room starts to cave in on them.

“Amy... I am scared.” Melody said, being frightened by the growing feeling she is having. But soon that fear would really spread as suddenly they grew big to burst out of the room and cause some damage to the house. “Oh no... this is bad, mom is going to kill us!”

“I know, right?” Amy said.

Suddenly the girls have another huge growth spurt, now really growing big as they suddenly expand and burst straight out of the house, and they continue growing until they stop at 200ft for Amy, and 150ft for Melody. All of the bikini was still intact, and as a matter of fact, the growth also made Amy and Melody even sexier. Amy now has D-Cup breasts while Melody grew to a C-Cup breasts. The people around the neighborhood all look before the two kaiju-sized girls, wondering what they will do next.

What happens now?
123.title: The Rise of the Siszillas

choices: Movie Day, going to see a giant monster movie
Theme Park, going to ride some rides
Going to a party with friends (aliens might grow more people)
Before they can decide their day, they start growing right away
15.content: What other ideas could they be going for now?
15.title: Other ideas?

155.content: Maybe one (or both) of the sisters could shrink instead of grow?
155.title: Small ideas

1553.content:
Okay, before we go to shrinking both of the girls, maybe I can mention another story option?

Both shrink: As the name applies, they both shrink.

Growth by different means: What if the girls end up growing by different means instead of aliens, or something like that, wanna try that?
1553.title: You sure?

15532.content: What if both Melody and Amy find an item or something that allows them to grow or shrink at will, perhaps this could lead to some fun scenarios where they can grow at will or what not and have some fun.
15532.title: They find an item?

155322.content: Alright, what if they make the girls grow in a different way. Perhaps the aliens fire the ray at them, but instead of growing slowly or something like that, they grow when they use anything electrical, like their phones or stuff like that? Now imagine them growing and absorbing electricity.
155322.title: Electric Growth?

1553222.content: Maybe they could end up developing some sort of superpowers by some means by the aliens that allows them to grow and adjust their own heights at Will? Maybe they become superheroes or super villains. What would you want?
1553222.title: Superpowers

15533.content:
What if in a shocking twist, one way or another the world was having to already deal with both of the girls growing giant all of their lives? Like the aliens were both there at different times of their birth, and hit the ray on both of the girls, and as they grew older, they grew much bigger than normal people in the world. By certain ages, they are both seen as giants across the world basically?

Want to have them been growing since they were babies, and don’t worry, the aliens were there on both different occassions?
15533.title: Growing their whole lives

choices: There is more than just Amy and Melody on this one (yes)
155332.content: Alright, what if there was another giantess, either related or unrelated to Amy and Melody that was introduced first doing something in the city or some sort of universe interaction thing before Amy and Melody becomes giants? Don’t worry, they still become giants, but what if we had another girl who is a giant before than, so Amy and Melody can be small to a giant beforehand. Wanna do that?
155332.title: Another giantess before Amy and Melody

choices: Yeah, turn Amy and Melody into more beasts overtime
1553322.content: What if Amy and Melody grow, and then some? Well imagine them also getting transformations and what not into other things, like perhaps a furry, or maybe anthro, perhaps make them have Godzilla like abilities? Etc... so many possibilities.
1553322.title: Transformations Into Other Beings?

15533222.content:
Here is a cool idea. Perhaps the aliens used their alien ray to link the two girls together. The twist is, is that when one person grows, the other person shrinks. They can control it at will, but it comes at the cost of the other. The aliens did this in case one person tries to stop the other’s rampage, so they for sure get the rampager for sure.

Wanna try this?
15533222.title: Here is a cool idea

info.brief_description: Amy was expecting a average day, when alien growth rays leads to them growing!
info.description:
for this interactive story, the tale will involve Amy and Melody. Amy is a 15 year old girl who lives with her 9 year old sister, Melody. One day while out and about, (there will be different scenarios!) a mysterious alien growth ray test leads to them growing colossal as the day goes on! Bigger and bigger!

Just a few rules
1) in all growing sceanarios, Amy and Melody will have heir clothes rip off, but their underwear, bra, or bikini, will grow win them. :)
2) you can focus on only one of the sisters depending on the sceanario, such as if they are separated, (such as, Amy goes to high school and Melody goes to elementary)
3) have fun! Keep them growing!
